Desc: Each stack of [Spiritual Wound] deals 10% <color=#e0cdad>Spirit</color> DMG every second for 5s.
Each stack of [Bleed] deals 15% <color=#e0cdad>Blood</color> DMG to the enemy every second for 3s.
Deals 30% <color=#e0cdad>Blood</color> DMG once every second for 3s.
Upon gaining a Shield, gains 1% additional Shield Points acquisition for every 1% <color=#e0cdad>Shield Strength</color>.
During healing, gains 1% additional healing for every 1% <color=#e0cdad>Recovery Efficiency</color>.
